title: 40 Shuunen Da yo!! CoroCoro All-Star Shougakkou
synopsis: Created In celebration of the 40th anniversary of the founding of Coro Coro Comics. The anime brings together many famous Coro Coro Comics characters. It takes place in an elementary school the characters attend.
